flawed_nl_solution:
Lena has 3 clippings per friend, so she has 3 * 7 = <<3*7=12>>12 clippings to glue.
She needs 6 drops of glue per clipping, so she will need 6 * 12 = <<6*12=72>>72 drops of glue.
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
